post_text: 5. The last photo of a Barbary Lion, taken in 1924. The last recorded Barbary lion was shot in Morocco in 1942. https://t.co/xO1rHIOU3M

The top part of the image depicts a lion walking away in the distance, while the bottom part shows a lion lying down on a rocky outcrop, appearing relaxed. The landscape is arid, with sparse vegetation.
